content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0, 0))

### Second stone furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (2, 0))

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to missing ingredients
- Ensure that all required ingredients are gathered before attempting to craft an item. For example, the stone furnace requires 5 stone, which must be collected first.

### Errors when trying to craft an item without sufficient inventory
- Check your inventory to ensure you have enough items to craft the desired entity. For instance, not having enough iron plates led to the failure in crafting a second stone furnace.

### Errors when inserting items into a furnace
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace. The error occurred when trying to insert iron ore into the first furnace without having any in the inventory.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the position where you are trying to place an entity is free and not occupied by another entity.
